content: here s a lovely little bag made with corner flower granny squares the free pattern tutorial guides you step-by-step on how to crochet it the corner flower granny square bag is compact with sturdy handles and an optional long strap tunisian stitch long strap tutorial link below it s so pretty and easy and so useful it might be small but this little bag is large enough for your wallet sunglasses kindle and other essentials for a wonderful day out its eye-catching bohemian vibe adds a pop of color to any outfit
